titleStmt.title: A vvord more to Mr. Thomas Edwards minister, by William VValwyn marchant. Concerning the nationall covenant.
titleStmt.author: Walwyn, William, 1600-1681.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed according to order, by Thomas Paine.,

notesStmt.note: A reply to: Edwards, Thomas. Gangræna (Wing E228).
Annotation on Thomason copy: "March 19"; the second 6 in imprint date crossed out and date altered to 1645.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
